mapper.insert: insert into lms_playlist (playlistName, creatorEmail, seq) values (#{playlistName}, #{creatorEmail}, #{seq})
mapper.update: update lms_playlist set seq=#{seq} where playlistID=#{playlistID}
update lms_playlist set playlistName=#{playlistName} where playlistID=#{playlistID}
update lms_playlist set description=#{description} where playlistID=#{playlistID}
mapper.select: select * from lms_playlist order by seq desc
mapper.update: update lms_playlist set totalVideo = ( select count(*) from Video where playlistID=#{playlistID} ) where playlistID=#{playlistID}
update lms_playlist set totalVideoLength = ( select sum(duration) from Video where playlistID=#{playlistID} ) where playlistID=#{playlistID}
